description: This requirement is only open to the below list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS).
duration_in_months: Our notice period is two (2) years, plus three (3) irrevocable option years.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Project Lead/Executive Services
#### Request for Proposal

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2023-24/A
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01024459

**Project Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Senior Project Leader/Executive consulting services. The Fighter Capability Office (FCO) within the DND requires specialized services to support the objectives of the FCO and to define and manage the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions for the Department's future fighter capability requirements.

**Objectives:**
The successful bidder will provide a senior project leader/executive consultant to support the FCO in achieving their objectives. The consultant will be responsible for defining and managing the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions for the Department's future fighter capability requirements.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of work includes:

* Project management services
* Business consulting and change management
* Human resource services

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**
This RFP is open only to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) category. A list of pre-qualified suppliers is provided in the attached documentation.

**Attachments:**
None

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:

* Sharon Sally
* DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca
* 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Z4
* Phone: 819-939-8990
* Fax: None

**Tender Deadline:**
The tender deadline is February 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST).

**Security Clearance:**
A security clearance of FSC - Secret is required.

Note that several details from the original text have been excluded or modified to fit within the 400-word limit. The rewritten text has been reformatted for markdown and includes the relevant information. Also, some minor errors have been corrected in the process.  Hope this helps! 
Please let me know if there are any other questions.  Just give me a shout.
